attributes.action: stop plans of building any nuclear power plants in britain and instead fund more renewable energy resources
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if more money was put into renewable energy resources in britian there would be no need for any nuclear power plants. the only positive effect a nuclear power plant would have is to create another target for terrorists to create more evil and suffering

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
